description.title: ADVICE TO BE FOLLOWED BEFORE ANY OPERATION

descsection.para: For an operation requiring the use of a lift, follow the safety advice vehicle : towing and liftingGIEMR-002447

description.title: INSTRUCTIONS TO BE FOLLOWED DURING THE OPERATION

noteR.para: In order to prevent irreversible damage to the front hub bearing:

ul.li: Do not loosen or tighten the driveshaft nut when the wheels are on the ground,
Do not place the vehicle with its wheels on the ground when the driveshaft has been loosened or removed.

descsection.para: Lubricate the base of the driveshaft bearing with BR2 + Grease vehicle: parts and consumables for the repairGIEMR-002445 to prevent the bearing from sticking.
Make sure that the O-ring is correctly positioned in the base of the relay bearing, if the bearing has one.

noteR.para: A gearbox oil leak at the driveshaft may destroy it.

ul.li: the O-ring, if fitted to the bearing,
the left-hand driveshaft locking spring ring, if the driveshaft has one,
the differential output seals every time a driveshaft is removed.
